experience.title: Front End Engineer
experience.detail: Collaborated with a team of designers and project managers to implement user-friendly interfaces for blockchain web applications in a DeFi (decentralized finance) environment.

experience.title: Front End Engineer
experience.detail: Developed projects, key features including Cost Management, Night Audit, Rate Adjustment, and Reservation Management for property management systems.

experience.title: Back End Engineer
experience.detail: Developed web services for an Intelligent Evacuation System, enabling communication between LoRa devices and detecting high-decibel sounds, such as shooting incidents.

projects.name: LinkMap
projects.detail: An AI-powered platform to enhance your LinkedIn networking. Easily extract and export your connections via a browser extension, and let AI categorize them for efficient management and nurturing.

projects.name: Simple Crypto Wallet
projects.detail: A Next.js web app enables users to connect to their MetaMask wallet, check Ethereum and token balances, and send ethers or tokens to other addresses. Hosted on Vercel.

projects.name: Dev Portfolio
projects.detail: Personal development portfolio website supporting both English and Korean languages, with built-in support for dark and light themes. Hosted on Vercel & incorporates i18N for localization.

projects.name: Canvas Confetti
projects.detail: Personal art portfolio site, created using JavaScript and Sass on Vue.js. AWS S3 & Cloudfront for distribution, and Github Actions for CI/CD.

articles.headline: AWS CloudFront Invalidation for modified objects.
Deploy a static Vue, Nuxt.js website with AWS S3.
